items.name: BeautySpot - Beauty Salon WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: WordPress Theme for Beauty Salons

items.description:
A Five Star WordPress Theme For Your Beauty Business

BeautySpot is a premium WordPress theme for a beauty salon, hairdresser, wellness or spa websites. It can be also easily used for many other beauty niche business sites like barber shops, nail studios, pedicure and manicure places or tattoo parlours.

A quality made in Europe – attention to details in frontend, backend and in the code. Its five star rating is also backed by clear documentation and reliable support offered via support and presale forum or a private message.

With over 100 updates since its initial release, the BeautySpot proves to be one of the most trustworthy WordPress themes around!

Check out the BeautySpot in the Live Preview

Built With No Clutter, Straight To The Point Philosophy

The clean code will please not only developers, in case you decide to do some advanced code customization, but also search engines, as the BeautySpot was built with good SEO practices in mind.

To better suit your business branding, BeautySpot allows you to create a custom color scheme in just a few clicks. It should go without saying that this is a responsive theme, so your site will look great on both mobile and desktop devices!

BeautySpot is ready to be translated to your language (with support for RTL languages) and it is optimized for the WordPress block editor (Gutenberg). The Elementor plugin and WPBakery Page Builder are supported as well.

Main Features

This theme comes with several built-in post types, allowing you to manage various types of content.

Blog module is the most efficient solution to share useful professional tips or inform your clients about news in your salon.

FAQ module can be used to save some time on answering emails by adding answers to the most frequent questions asked by your clients.

Galleries module is a simple tool to display examples of your work and photos of your salon.

People module is an useful way to introduce your hard-working team in a simple yet elegant manner with portraits and short bio.

Services module is the bread and butter of this theme. Simple way to present all your services to your potential clients.

Testimonials module comes handy when you want to show testimonies of your happy clients to strengthen the trust for your business.

General Features

Mobile-friendly design
The theme looks great and it’s easy to work with on devices of various screen sizes.

Gutenberg compatible
Support for WordPress native editor to easily build your custom pages. There is no need for a 3rd party page builder (but it also works with Elementor and WPBakery Page Builder).

Custom color schemes
Create a custom color scheme by picking main colors via admin in just a few clicks, or get more involved using the dedicated CSS (SCSS) file and be able to change every color of the theme.

Translation files included
This theme and all the bundled LSVR plugins are completely translatable.

Modular post types
You can disable post types you don’t need to make your admin completely bloat-free.

Demo content included
You can re-create the live preview site in a matter of few minutes (however, please note that demo images are not included for copyright reasons and imported demo pages can be edited using the WordPress block editor only).

Developer-friendly code
The code is well-commented and all front-end code can be overriden via a child theme.

Child theme included
Make your site ready for a more advanced code customization.

RTL support
The theme will automatically switch to RTL (Right-to-left) mode when you switch your site language to RTL one.

PHP 8 compatibility
Squeeze the most of your server performance by using the latest version of PHP.

Images seen in live preview (demo) are NOT included.

Admin Screens

Front page edit screen | Service post edit screen | Service pages customizer screen

FAQ

Is the price of the item an one-time payment or a recurring one?
As with all items on ThemeForest, it is just one-time payment. This payment includes six months of support and access to updates for the lifetime of the item (meaning for as long as the item will be sold on ThemeForest). You can extend the support if needed.

What is included in the item support?
Item support includes help with theme-related issues or explanation of theme features. While the customization is not included, I usually help my customers with some simple CSS snippets if needed, and provide some useful hints when it comes to the code customization. Please make sure to read through the theme documentation before reaching for a support, as it should answer most of your questions. You can read this official article to learn more about the item support.

Can I use the theme on both staging/development site and the live one at the same time?
Yes, you can use the theme on as many staging/development sites as you like, in parallel with your live site. The only limitation is that a single license allows you to use the theme with only one final live site. You can read more on licenses here.

How can I contact you privately?
You can use a contact form on my profile page to send me a private message.

Is the WPBakery Page Builder plugin included with the theme?
Yes, the bundled version of this plugin is included.

Does this theme offers booking functionality?
No, the contact form on the live preview site is just a basic contact form created via Contact Form 7 plugin. However, “Make An Appointment” button in the left sidebar can be linked to any page you want, if you for example decide to use 3rd party booking system.

Does the theme support WooCommerce plugin?
Yes, there is a basic integration with the WooCommerce, but please keep in mind that this is not primarily an ecommerce theme. Some additional customization may be needed for more seamless WooCommerce integration.

Need Assistance?

Online Documentation | Support and Presale Forum | Send a PM

Customer Reviews

Amazing customer support, great instructions! Love this theme!

Great looking theme, it’s snappy, easy to customize and support is great.

Definitely one of the most unique theme designs anywhere (for my type of business). Haven’t fully set it up, but so far it deserves a 5. Will change if necessary. As long as I get A+ support from author (which it looks like) then I am very pleased with my purchase.

Great Theme easy to customize … love it

Great theme, very up-to-date features, and the BEST support! Thanks Lubos!

items.name: UBlog - Responsive WordPress Theme for Bloggers

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: A premium blog style responsive WordPress theme.

items.description:
UBlog is a clean, minimal, modern and responsive WordPress theme for bloggers. UBlog supports 8 post formats (Standard, Gallery, Link, Quote, Video, Image, Status and Audio).

It also provides an easy option to choose 8 different layouts for blog and archive pages and 3 different layouts for single pages.

UBlog can be fully customized with many styling options, lots of layouts and typography options. This theme also supports self hosted audio and video. Twitter and Facebook updates can also be easily shared in posts.

What customers are saying about UBlog

Features

  • Custom logo
  • Custom favicon
  • 1 Click Demo Importer
  • 8 layout options
  • 3 header types
  • 1, 2, 3 and 4 column footer option

8 Blog Layouts:

UBlog supports 8 types of blog layouts. You can choose different layouts for home, archives and single pages.

  • Standard Blog with Left Sidebar

  • Standard Blog with Left and Right Sidebar
  • 2 Columns Masonry

15 Custom Widgets:

8 Post Formats

items.name: Throne - Personal Blog WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: A Personal Blog/Magazine WordPress Theme.

items.description:
Throne is a responsive WordPress theme for personal blogs, magazines or marketing websites with a professional design. It is highly customizable to match your personal taste, and can easily be converted into a multi-purpose theme to suit a wide range of needs.

Throne features list

  • Unique Layout – Display your posts in the top featured section, combined with the classic post listing below, with over 50 different layout combinations in total.
  • Flexible Header – Throne comes with several header layouts. From the simple header with navigation, all through the news style header with banner ads and mega menus.
  • Diverse Categories – Assign a different layout to each category. It’s a great way to make your category pages unique and dynamic.
  • Post Formats Support – Throne supports video, audio, image, quote, gallery and link post formats. Common WordPress embedding features like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram are supported as well.
  • Responsive Design – Your content will scale seamlessly on all of today’s modern devices including desktops, laptops, tablets and mobile phones
  • Branding – Throne provides options for unlimited fonts and color combinations, as well as dedicated sections to upload your logo and icons
  • Social Sharing Integrated – Throne provides full social sharing integration for your blog posts. Simply choose and reorder the social networks you wish to use.
  • Custom Widgets – Alongside the standard WordPress widgets, Throne features several custom widgets that further extend its functionality.
  • Shortcodes – Add complex elements to your content easily with 12 flexible shortcodes – columns, highlights, dropcaps, buttons, pull quotes, progress bars and social icons, to name just a few.
  • Unlimited Sidebars – You can create as many sidebars as you need and connect them to specific posts or pages. The footer area is also widgetized!
  • Built-in Theme Translator – Easily modify or translate any text on your website through the theme options panel.
  • One Click Updates – You can connect your website with the Envato official API to be notified about upcoming updates through your Admin Dashboard. Every time a Throne update is released, you can update with a single click, just like you would for any other theme hosted on the official WordPress repository.
  • Setup guide – Learn step-by-step, how to setup Throne and all of its options, quickly and easily with our comprehensive documentation.
  • One-click demo content import – Demo content is included, so you get a website similar to our demo, ready to start tweaking!

Change log

2.2

  • Improved: Tested compatibility with WordPress 6.3
  • Improved: Tested compatibility with PHP8
  • Fixed: Inherit option in Layout settings for single posts
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues, your website now looks better on new mobile devices

2.1

  • Improved: Tested compatibility with WordPress 6.0 (yes, it’s safe to update your theme)
  • Fixed: Gallery post format original theme styling compatibility with Gallery Blocks since WP 5.8+

2.0

  • Fixed: FireFox Redux saving options problem
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues, your website now looks better on new mobile devices

1.9

  • Improved: WordPress 5.8 compatibility tweaks (yes,you can update your theme)
  • Improved: Several onpage SEO tweaks (added noopener tag to several target=”_blank” attributes)
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues

1.8.3

  • Fixed: WP 5.7 Gutenberg editor font size
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues
1.8.2
  • Added: Options to choose multiple stylings for social sharing in the plugin settings in dashboard (Settings -> Meks Easy Social Share)
  • Added: Official support for WP Forms WordPress plugin
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues
1.8.1
Great news! Throne theme has been awarded the “WP requirements compliance badge” by Envato/ThemeForest, which is a certificate proving that it now meets the highest quality standards in the WordPress ecosystem.
  • Improved: A slight code refactoring to meet the highest standards per Envato requirements
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues
1.8
Mandatory changes to accommodate the latest Envato/ThemeForest requirements:
  • Theme Options panel is removed from the theme. To make it appear again, you need to install and activate Redux Framework Plugin via Appearance -> Throne plugins
  • All theme associated widgets cannot be a part of the theme anymore and are now removed. To get your widgets back, please install and activate Throne Buddy plugin in Appearance -> Throne plugins
  • Social sharing functionality cannot be a part of the theme anymore. To enable social sharing, please install and activate Meks Easy Social Share plugin in Appearance -> Throne plugins
  • Additional JS and Google Analytics fields are not allowed in Theme options anymore thus they are removed from the theme. As an alternative, you can use Insert Headers and Footers WordPress Plugin
  • Additional CSS field is not allowed in Theme options anymore and is now patched into the WordPress native field in Appearance -> Customize -> Additional CSS
  • Favicon option is not allowed in Theme options anymore and is now patched into the WordPress native favicon field in Appearance -> Customize -> Site Identity
Other:
  • Added: Styling support for the latest WordPress blocks (introduced in WordPress 5.2)
  • Added: Admin panel styling for WP 5.0+ editor and all blocks
  • Modified: Options to choose social networks for sharing are now located in the plugin settings in dashboard (Settings -> Meks Easy Social Share)
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues

1.7.4

  • Pages in admin edit screen not displaying metaboxes when WP 5.x used Classic Editor plugin
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues

1.7.3

  • Added: Styling for Blocks (coming with the new WordPress editor in version 5.0)
  • Improved: Fully tested and ready for WordPress 5.0
  • Improved: Envato Market plugin is now recommended for theme updates
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues
  • Added: Initial support for the upcoming new WordPress content editor (Gutenberg)
  • Improved: Styling for GDPR cookie consent checkbox field in comment form
  • Fixed: Several minor styling issues
1.7.1
  • Fixed: Problem with load more and infinite scroll on Layouts C and D
  • Fixed: Couple of minor styling issues
1.7
  • Added: Options for Load More and Infinite Scroll pagination ( Theme Options -> General)
  • Added: Authors Page Template which lists all blog authors
  • Added: Option to choose Featured Layout for Pages, and override that option on specific page ( Theme Options -> Page Templates )
  • Added: Option to enable content image(s) open in pop-up ( Theme Options -> General )
  • Improved: Excerpt character limitation now works better for languages with special characters
  • Fixed: Some minor bugs and styling issues in various browsers as well as in responsive mode
1.6.1
  • Improved: RTL stylings
  • Fixed: Video post format not displaying title (in 1.6)
  • Fixed: Layout C and D styling bugs on specific resolutions
1.6
  • Added: Full “Related posts” functionality for single posts (Theme Options -> Single Post)

  • Added: Throne Adsense Widget – option to expand widget width to fit 300px wide ads

  • Added: Header Styling – option to upload logo for devices which support retina displays

  • Improved: Sidebars – theme options will now recognize all other custom created sidebars added by other sidebar generator plugins you may want to use
  • Improved: All widgets fully supports new customizer in WP 3.9+

items.name: Classify - Classified Ads WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Classify Classified Ads WordPress Theme the perfect solution for your classifieds business.

items.description:
Classify is an exceptional Classified Advertising Theme for WordPress. Responsive, Optimized for SEO, Featured Ads, Front End Submissions, Pay Per Post & much more..















Future Proof Classified Ads Theme

Classify has been designed and developed from the ground up using Bootstrap, HTML5 & CSS3 to give you a modern, future proof framework so that you can be assured your website is never out of date.

Add to that Lifetime Support, our Free Installation offer plus a Lifetime of Free Updates and you truly have a future proofed theme for building websites for years to come.

Ads, Ads & More Ads!

Even though you can build almost any kind of website with Classify, it has definitely been conceived with responsive ads in mind.

You have full support for Directory and Classified listings, as well as Video Ads and support for many types of Custom Fields.

Multiple User Login Options

Most users want a simplified login experience and depend on the big social media players for this. With Classify you can provide Google, Facebook and Twitter logins for ease of use and convenience guaranteeing you will satisfy your customers first time, every time.


Advanced Search

Classify has some of the most advanced Search features for creating a powerful and intuitive user experience for your audience, including a new Advanced Search Widget with Custom Fields. This makes Search that much more usable, providing a rich deep dive search functionality that customers will love.

WooCommerce

Complete with full WooCommerce integration you are ready to monetize your website with a host of super cool features included like Ads Pricing Plans and Pay Per Post.

With WooCommerce at the core of the design you can extend functionality as required with full access to all Shortcodes etc without any compatibility concerns.

Responsive Design

As well as a cross browser supper but a fully responsive design, you have full touch swipe compatibility – even with Sliders. This means that no matter what device your new website is viewed upon – laptops, tablets, smartphones and even smartwatches – it is going to display perfectly in high resolution – and your sliders will be touch & swipe compatible! How good is that?

Geo-location Support via Google Maps

Provide targeted, specific to a location information easily with the integration of Google Maps with support for Geo-location tagging. You can also make use of Google Map styles options for a cohesive design that works with your website.

Features

The Classify is a Premium Classified WordPress theme, super flexible and has a fully responsive design (try resizing your browser). Built with HTML5 and CSS3 . A lot of thought and care were put into Classify making it a pleasure to use.

We carefully hand crafted this template with a strong focus on typography, usability and overall user-experience. Its very quick to setup and easy to customize. Have a look at features.

  • Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website
  • Elementor Page Builder – Drag & Drop Page Builder

  • Twitter login
  • Google Plus Login
  • Email Notifications
  • Multilingual Support using WPML ( pot file included)
  • Shortcode System
  • Social Share for Posts
  • Well commented code.
  • HTML 5 & CSS 3
  • RTL Supported
  • and much more.

Home Page Styles

  • Home Page With LayerSlider
  • Home Page With Shop
  • Home Page With Google Map
  • Home Page with PREMIUM Ads Slider
  • HomePage Listing with Sidebar
  • HomePage Listing with FullWidth

Support

Item support includes:

  • Free Theme Installation.
  • Free Theme demo setup.
  • Availability of the author to answer questions on ticket support.
  • Answering technical questions about item’s features.
  • Assistance with reported bugs and issues.
  • Help with included 3rd party assets

items.name: Captiva - Responsive WordPress WooCommerce Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Captiva is a beautiful WooCommerce theme which will get you selling in a jiffy.

items.description:
Customer Testimonials

Highlights

Features

  • Boxed or full width layout
  • Mobile friendly and retina-ready design
  • Sticky header
  • Color skins ready to use with more to come!
  • Banner image uploader on each page
  • Visual composer included HOT!
  • PLUS, Visual Composer Add Ons Pack! HOT!
  • Tonnes of Shortcodes
  • Left, right or no sidebars on listings and product pages
  • Display products in a list or grid format
  • Hide or show categories
  • Use background photos or patterns

Header Features

  • Optionable top bar to show specials or key messages
  • Adjust the height of the regular, fixed and mobile headers
  • Change the color to match your brand
  • WPML support for a multi-language site HOT
  • Plugin included: Predictive Ajax search results as you type HOT
  • Megamenu with image support
  • Change the color of the Cart icon (5 different ones included)
  • Layer slider included HOT
  • Unlimited sliders

Pages

  • 5 Different Homepages to get you started
  • Contact page
  • About page
  • Our services
  • Left and right sidebar options
  • FAQ dropdowns page
  • Pinterest style
  • 3 blog layouts and all the post formats (audio, video, gallery, image, quote, link, aside)
  • 3 showcase/portfolio layouts and details page

EXTRA PLUGINS

  • Visual Composer and Add Ons Pack (value of $40)
  • Ajax product filters
  • Wishlist optional feature
  • Layer Slider for beautiful slideshows (value of $15)
  • Cloud Zoom on the product details page
  • Shop Announcements slider to highlight great offers
  • Captiva Toolkit plugin by CommerceGurus for advanced customization
  • Ajax automatic search results as you type
  • Wordpress SEO

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE

  • Background photo and pattern uploader
  • Adjust the height of the regular, fixed and mobile headers
  • Pre selected colors or add your own
  • Show 2 footers or just 1
  • Fully customizable design: set your color and font for each typographic selector
  • Add a sizeguide to the product details page
  • Catalog mode – to use the theme like a catalog, without the cart option
  • Built-in Google fonts. Over 650 Web Fonts support with preview

AND ALSO…

  • SEO optimized HOT
  • Child theme support
  • Bootstrap 3 Grid
  • Shortcode manager with tonnes of shortcodes
  • 404 error page
  • Unlimited contact forms with javascript validation HOT
  • Video tutorials and demo files

Sample Data

Installing the Captiva theme demo data takes just minutes allowing you to get up and running in no time at all. The sample images are not included in the theme and are replaced with grey placeholders.

items.name: WPJobus - Job Board and Resumes WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Job Directory WordPress Theme.

items.description:
WPJobus is a robust 3-in-1 WordPress Responsive Theme, which you can use as a 1. Job Board / Portal 2. Personal Resume and 3. Company Profile website.

1. Job Board / Portal



First of all, on WPJobus you can browse, search and filter / refine 3 entities: jobs, companies and resumes. And here companies have complex profiles and can be filtered / sorted in a companies directory. The same goes for Jobs and Resumes directories.

And you don’t depend on any additional 3rd party plugins which imply several limitations and, in some cases, additional costs. It’s all standalone and included in the theme.



Imagine 60+ fields only for a quality Resume output, all created while keeping in mind europass CV recomendations and everything displayed in a very visual and engaging form, using transition effects, animations and parallax.

Faceted search filters and refinements for Jobs, Resumes and Companies Directories.

It is Stripe Ready, which means that it has a instant monetization model built-in – for publishing featured resumes, jobs or company profiles!

And many more great features. For a complete list of features, scroll down to the Features section.

2. Personal Resume



It can be easily used as a powerful and, what’s more important, a very visual appealing one-page Resume theme in which you can showcase all your skills, education, awards, career, portfolio and contact details.



3. Company Profile



It’s really easy to setup the theme as a company website. It’s all in – just fill the fields and set your company as the homepage of the theme and you’re done!









Features Overview

  • 3-in-1: Can be used as a Job Board / Portal, Personal One-Page Resume website or Company Profile website.
  • Standalone – Has everything it needs built-in and doesn’t need other 3rd party plugins to work (like for example Listify needs WP Job Manager)
  • 100+ built-in fields for describing in detail Companies Profiles, Job Offers and Resumes
  • Directories with Google Maps and AJAX search for Companies, Resumes and Job Offers.
  • Faceted search with filters and refinements for Companies, Job Offers and Resumes.
  • Latest web technologies for an oustanding User eXperience: HTML5, CSS3, AJAX, jQuery, Parallax effect, Page Preloaders, etc.
  • The most extensive and detailed Resume, Company Profile and Job Offer page on the market.
  • Stripe Ready – has a instant monetization model built-in – for publishing featured resumes, jobs or company profiles
  • LayerSlider – includes the Responsive LayerSlider ($15 value)
  • Testimonials for Resumes and Company profiles
  • Front-End Data Input User Interface through which the user can create and account, login, fill-in their Resume, add several Company Profiles and assign to them Job Offers.
  • Modern, Beautiful & Clean Flat Responsive Design, mobile and tablet ready.
  • Awesome Typography with customization from the backend, making use of huge Google 630+ Fonts library.
  • Retina-Ready
  • FontAwesome 480+ icons library
  • Built on the robust ReduxFramework for design customization and advanced settings from the admin area
  • Unlimited color-schemes
  • Static pages templates – How it Works, Contact Us, Pricing Plans, About us, Blog, and more…
  • Custom Shortcodes
  • WordPress 3.8+ Ready
  • Multi-Language Support
  • Extensive Documentation

items.name: Munch - Restaurant & Business WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Lovingly created by EugeneO.

items.description:
THIS IS AN OLD THEME. SUPPORT IS NO LONGER BEING OFFERED. THIS THEME IS UNTESTED WITH THE LATEST VERSION OF WORDPRESS.

Munch is a bold premium WordPress theme. It is perfect for restaurants, bars, cafes, salons, barber shops and many other small businesses with a menu based product offering. It features extensive built in styling options to make tailoring the theme to your business quick and easy as well as some subtle CSS3 animations.

Important

If you import the demo content and are using the existing contact form please make sure you enter your email address in the contact form’s edit screen and edit the “Message Body” to include your site name.

Getting Support

If you encounter a bug in the theme or have any pre purchase questions you can get support by posting your issue or question on the item’s comments page. When posting responses to your post please use the “reply” button on your original post so your conversation is threaded. This makes it easier to follow.

Features

Fully Customizable

The WP Customizer allows you to configure your site quickly and easily with a live preview of the changes as you go.

To speed things up even more there are four colour scheme presets you can use as they are or as a base for your own colour scheme.

Responsive & Mobile Ready

Whether your visitors are viewing your site using their smartphone while on the move or using their desktop computers at home, Munch always looks great.

Extensive Theme Options

The extensive colour and typography options allow you to tailor the look and feel of your site to match your brand perfectly.

All options are presented in a user friendly manner in the theme options panel.

Shortcodes

The Funky Shortcodes plugin includes some simple to use styling shortcodes to give your content a little extra punch.

Shortcodes are easily accessible on the page edit screen via the Visual and Text tabs on the content editor.

Search Engine Optimization

Munch includes schema.org mark-up used by search engines to improve the display of search results, making it easier for the right people to find your website.

Not only will your site be found, visitors will have immediate access to the important information they want to know.

Parallax

It’s the most popular trend in web design. Munch includes some subtle scrolling effect to give the polished and professional look your business deserves.

Excellent Support

You’ll find a 2000+ word documentation file included with the theme that will take you, step by step, through all the common tasks you might need to perform in order to get your site up and running.

If you get stuck you can count on reliable and fast support from an Elite ThemeForest author with more than 7,500 happy customers.

Reservation Forms

Munch includes shortcodes to integrate the popular Bookatable reservation systems into your site.

The shortcode include a content editor buttons and a popup window to configure the shortcode.

Product Menus

Turn any page into a quick and simple menu using the menu shortcode. The shortcode is designed to be easy to use but produce an eye catching menu page.

600+ Google Fonts

You can change the font of just about any text that appears on your site from within the theme options. With more than 600 Google fonts to choose from and every font styling option available, you can get your site text looking exactly how you want it.

Instagram Feed

Drive traffic between your Instagram feed and your website by including your latest images at the bottom of any page. Display the great food you serve and show everyone the fantastic atmosphere your customers enjoy.

Feature List

  • Responsive – Looks great from desktop down to smartphone
  • Beautiful – A Clean, bold design that can be customized to match your brand
  • Extensive theme options – Change settings, styling, layout and content via the theme options or WP Customizer
  • Template options – Tweak specific pages with built in options relating to the specific template you assign them
  • Sequence slider – A lightweight slider that utilizes CSS3 animations
  • Flexible default page template:
    • Small header
    • Large header
    • Left subpage links sidebar
    • Right widget sidebar
    • Double sidebar
  • Additional page templates:
    • Home
    • Contact
    • Gallery
    • Parallax
  • Unlimited colour options – Match your site to your brand perfectly
  • Unlimited font options – With 600+ Google fonts to choose from you are limited only by your creativity
  • Customizable Google maps – See the demo
  • Instagram feed – Show your latest snaps in the site footer and on the gallery page template
  • Social networking – Site footer contains links to your social network profiles including facebook, twitter, google plus and foursquare
  • Funky Shortcodes plugin – See the demo
  • Funky Restaurants plugin – See the demo
    • Menu item shortcode
    • Bookatable reservation form shortcode
  • Translation ready – Includes .po and WPML configuration .xml files
  • Easy to use – Built on existing WordPress functionality
  • Demo content – XML file for you to import straight into your WordPress site (excludes images)
  • Well documented – 2000+ word documentation file.

items.name: EventMe - Corporate Event Landing Wordpress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Created by ovatheme

items.description:
EventMe – Corporate Event Landing WordPress Theme is second to none in its suitability and adaptability for managing the whole gamut of events. It is fully responsive and is equipped with its own carousel.

It is well equipped to handle all types of events and functions with excellent customizability and feature availability. The theme helps the user in multiple tasks such as scheduling, notifications, promotion and so on. Responsiveness is at the center of the theme’s design as it is meant for facilitating event organizing. Besides, it has its own style selector and dedicated sections for client testimonials and ‘About Event’. Certain outstanding features of the template are:

  • Crystal clear pricing table
  • Highlights Section for earlier events
  • Separated blog section
  • Timelines to keep you updated

Enjoy the spirit of management with the fantastic EventMe – Corporate Event Landing WordPress Theme, just for you.

Please remove iframe when you view our demo in mobile device

What our customer say about this theme

EventMe is a one page Wordpress Theme for any type of events which has all the needed UI elements.



More Event Landing Themes

items.name: T.Joy - Astronomy WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Astronomy WordPress Theme

items.description:
Latest Version 2.5.0 – September 24, 2022 – view changelog

Description

T.Joy is designed in dark color scheme, inspired by space and astronomy thematic. Perfect for a technology companies, agencies, blogs and other technology websites.

But don’t feel restricted! It can be customized easily to suit your needs. T.Joy WordPress theme includes one of the greatest options panel – Redux Theme Options. You can easily change any theme color. The template comes with a lot of shortcodes so you can create any type of content you needed..

T.Joy comes with Page Builder (by SiteOrigin), premium Slider Revolution, 5 homepage layouts, 2,3,4 columns portfolio layouts, 5 blog pages, Contacts page and much more.

Features

  • 100% Responsive
  • Built on Bootstrap 3
  • WordPress 6.0 ready
  • Page Builder (by SiteOrigin) with 24+ custom widgets/elements
  • Slider Revolution included ($26)
  • Redux Framework (Theme Options Panel)
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Theme Customizer support (a real-time appearance editor)
  • Custom widgets (Flickr Feed, Latest Post, Social Links, Twitter Feed)
  • Translation Ready (.pot file included)
  • WMPL support
  • Google Maps integration
  • Working Contact Form (Contact Form 7 Plugin)
  • Google Web Fonts
  • Demo Content included (xml)
  • LESS/CSS based theme
  • Free Updates

Sources and Credits

  • Page Builder by SiteOrigin
  • Redux Framework
  • Slider Revolution Responsive WordPress Plugin
  • Bootstrap 3
  • WPML Translation Plugin
  • OWL Carousel
  • FlexNav
  • Animate.css
  • GMap3

items.name: Gauge: Multi-Purpose Review Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Designed by GhostPool.com.

items.description:
Gauge is a powerful review theme that allows you to create extensive reviews for any kind of content including games, movies, food etc. Each review item has its own centralised hub page with tabbed navigation where you can display all the news, videos and images relating to that item. Each item can be reviewed by both admins and users and this all comes packaged in a fully responsive, clean and modern design.

Full List of Features

  • Review system (for pages only)
    • Site and user ratings
    • Multiple criteria rating
    • Rich snippets in search results
    • Good and bad points
    • Order and filter by site and user ratings
    • Only allow logged in users to vote
    • User reviews
  • Hubs
  • Front-end posting
  • Multiple advertisement areas
  • BuddyPress/bbPress integration
  • Responsive
  • Ajax filtering
  • Bundled with Visual Composer (worth $34)
  • Tons of customization options
  • One click install
  • Powerful menus
  • Follow items
  • Front-end and social login
  • WooCommerce integration
  • Profile link/notifications counter
  • Multiple advertisement areas
  • Retina ready
  • Search engine optimisation (SEO)
  • Translation ready
  • Portfolios
  • Icon font (FontAwesome)
  • Clean code
  • Post formats
  • Individual and global options
  • Create unlimited sidebars
  • Child theme
  • Redux framework
  • Contact Form 7 ready
  • JavaScript fallback
  • Compatible in all major browsers
  • Valid HTML5 and CSS3

Changelog

To view the changelog please visit http://ghostpool.com/help/gauge/changelog.html

items.name: MagicBook - A 3D Flip Book WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: MagicBook is a real 3D flip book WordPress theme with unlimited page number,cool 3D menu, responsive feature and easy customization etc. Powered by Kevin Studio and FocuxTheme.

items.description:
An absolutely unique theme!

MagicBook is a real 3D flip book WordPress Theme with unlimited page number,cool 3D menu, responsive feature and easy customization etc. No more words, just have a look at the Demo site, believe that you will “WOW” !

MagicBook is actually a flipbook look like framework for the cool information shown. You can use for portfolio, vCard/resume, artwork, restaurant, activity, cooperation or anything you want to show in a really cool way

What can you do with it?

MagicBook is actually a book look like framework for the cool information shown. You can use for portfolio, vCard/resume, artwork, restaurant, activity, cooperation or anything you want to show in a really cool way … Just put it to good use, and get your visitor’s “WOW”!

Main Features

  • HTML5/CSS3
  • 3D Perspective Animate
  • Fully Responsive
  • Retina Ready
  • Easy Customizable with Page Builder (WPBakery Page Builder Included)
  • Unlimited Pages & Menu
  • Cool Animate with Portfolio
  • Advanced Theme Options
  • Cross-browser Compatible (IE9+/Firefox/Safari/Chrome/Opera)
  • Well Documented
  • WPML Ready
  • Demo Files Included (XML)
  • Excellent Support
  • And more…

What’s the buyers said recently?

IMAGES USED IN DEMO

We include all pictures and scripts credits in the readme.txt file. Thanks for all content creaters and script developers!

All images used in the demo are not included in the theme. They are all licensed under Creative Commons and credited to their respective creator/owner.
